title: "They allegedly drugged a fan." People want celebrity FIRED after allegations pile up

media:group.media:title: "They allegedly drugged a fan." People want celebrity FIRED after allegations pile up
media:group.media:description:
“A little fear can be a healthy thing, It helps you determine which risks are worth taking.” This is a quote from the hit DC series “The Flash.”

But from comic book to real life, the risks worth taking weren’t clear to Ezra Miller. From public freakouts to befriending and having allegedly inappropriate contact with a young fans, Ezra’s personal life is extremely bizarre and concerning.

Authorities are constantly involved and now Ezra has been cited to appear in court. What happened to the DC superstar? Why did the actor go missing for a period of time?

Let’s unravel the allegations against Ezra Miller.
